Reviews.Title: CCtv camera coax bnc Rj45
Reviews.Author: DOC RR
Reviews.Content: The CCtv camera coax BNC Rj45 is great for the purpose I am using it for. The device is the right size.

ProductInfo.Features:
Product Name : Video Balun;Material : Plastic, Metal
Main Color : Black;Distance : B/W 600M Color up to 400M
Frequency : 8 MHZ;Connector : RJ45 100 Ohm, BNC 75 Ohm
Size : 5 x 2.5 x 1.9cm/ 1.9" x 1" x 0.75"(L*W*H);Net Weight : 44g
Package Content : 2 x Video Balun
ProductInfo.Name: Gino CCTV Camera Coax BNC RJ45 UTP Cat5 Active Video Balun Transceiver Pair
